definitions.definition: A formal notice to a user on a website (particularly YouTube or other video-sharing site) reprimanding the user for copyright infringement .
examples: I uploaded a copy of the film trailer to the site, but the distributor removed it and gave me a copystrike .

main_definition: ( slang , Internet ) A formal notice to a user on a website (particularly YouTube or other video-sharing site) reprimanding the user for copyright infringement .
